divs: Sighting DetailsA friend of mine posted something on facebook about seeing something in the sky to the west, that she could not figure out. I went outside to see for myself. I was paying attention to a bright star, which may be Venus but I am not positive. It was a bright star none the less. I realized there was a dim, white light moving in circles to the south of the bright star. I continued to watch the dim light until it exploded into a bright red flash, which then continued to rapidly flash the bright red color. It moved in small circles and went from left to right in the sky very fast. I love to watch the skies and have seen some things that I could not explain but nothing like this. I attempted to video record the event but it just does not show up properly with my video camera, possibly due to the age of the camera. Regardless, I felt compelled to contact MUFON as I believe this to be a UFO. Whether or alien or not, I have never seen anything like this in the skies above Michigan.
